sentences.sContent: This is due to a stagnation of blood in the veins caused by prolonged immobility, which can promote blood clot formation in veins.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is due to a stagnation of blood in the veins caused by prolonged immobility, which can promote blood clot formation in veins.
sentences.sCn: 其原因是由于长时间不动，造成静脉血液停滞，促使静脉中血凝块形成。

sentences.sContent: If sleep paralysis is an example of too much immobility, so-called REMbehavior disorder is an example of too little.
sentences.sContent_eng: If sleep paralysis is an example of too much immobility, so-called REMbehavior disorder is an example of too little.
sentences.sCn: 如果睡眠瘫痪症是过于静止的例子，那么所谓快速眼动行为障碍就是一个太不安静的例子。

words.tran: 使固定；使不动；使停止流通
使…不动，使…固定；使…不能调动；使…无机动性
